testcase.name: Home page Ana sayfa açılır ve temel öğeler görünür
testcase.classname: Ana sayfa açılır ve temel öğeler görünür

failure.message:
Step implementation missing for "sayfa başlığında "Automation Exercise" görmeliyim".
We tried searching for files containing step definitions using the following search pattern templates:
- cypress/support/step_definitions/**.js
These templates resolved to the following search patterns:
- cypress\support\step_definitions\**.js
These patterns matched the following files:
- cypress\support\step_definitions\signup.steps.js - cypress\support\step_definitions\search.steps.js - cypress\support\step_definitions\contact.steps.js - cypress\support\step_definitions\common.steps.js - cypress\support\step_definitions\cartSteps.js
However, none of these files contained a step definition matching "sayfa başlığında "Automation Exercise" görmeliyim".
You can implement it using the suggestion(s) below.
Then("sayfa başlığında {string} görmeliyim", function (string) { return "pending"; });
